document_data.name: Thurlad Dauntrael
document_data.mainbody: '''Thurlad Dauntrael''' was the patriarch of the [[Dauntrael]] family in the late mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: His greatest passion was geography. However, he was completely uninterested in history, except where it pertained to magic; he had studied extensively the geography of Toril, completely disregarding political divisions during his study.
document_data.Possessions: His mansion of [[Steelbreeze]], southwest of [[Beregost]] in some rolling, coastal hills, had a tower with an orrery of [[Realmspace]].
